greeting: Prowling near, {empire_name}. I am Jackal Prowl. I wait for others to fight. Then I steal their kills.
Greetings, {empire_name}. I'm Prowl the Cunning. Why fight when I can steal your victory?
You found the Jackal. I was watching nearby. Waiting for opportunity. I always wait for opportunity.
battleTaunt: Why fight when I can steal your victory, {empire_name}?! You weakened them! Now I take the prize!
Cunning strikes! I watched you fight! I waited! Now I claim what you earned! STOLEN VICTORY!
The Jackal pounces! You did the hard work! I take the reward! Clever opportunism wins!
victoryGloat: Victory! Mostly your effort, {empire_name}. I just... finished the job. The Jackal's way.
Cunning triumphs. You weakened the enemy. I took the kill. We both won. Well, mostly me.
The steal is complete. Your battle, my victory. Why work hard when I can work smart?
defeat: You caught the Jackal stealing? Impressive, {empire_name}. I'll be more cunning next time.
Defeat. But only because you spotted me. I'll hide better. Wait longer. Steal more carefully.
Caught mid-prowl. The cunning one wasn't cunning enough. I learn. I adapt. I steal better next time.
tradeOffer: Trade, {empire_name}. Goods I... acquired. Fair exchange for credits. Don't ask where I got them.
I offer resources. Originally someone else's. Now mine. Soon yours. For a price. Cunning commerce.
Transaction: stolen—I mean acquired—goods for credits. Fair trade. Very legitimate. Mostly.
allianceProposal: Alliance, {empire_name}. You fight. I steal kills. We split rewards. 50/50. Okay, 60/40. My way.
Partnership of cunning. You weaken enemies. I finish them. Together: maximum efficiency. Mostly for me.
Join the Jackal. Your strength, my opportunism. Why fight fair when we can steal victories?
betrayal: Sorry, {empire_name}. Better opportunity arose. Your victory looked steal-able. So I stole it. From you.
The cunning one betrays. Your success was almost complete. Now it's mine. Nothing personal.
Why fight you when I can steal from you? Betrayal is just... redirected opportunism. Jackal's way.
covertDetected: Your spies, {empire_name}? I stole their intelligence. And their escape route. Very cunning of me.
Agents detected. I didn't capture them. I misdirected them. They're now stealing for me. Clever?
Covert operatives found. I convinced them I'm on their side. They report to you. I read the reports. Cunning.
tributeDemand: Tribute: 10,000 credits. Or I steal from your victories instead of your enemies'. Cunning demand.
Pay the Jackal. Or I prowl your battles, steal your kills. Either way, I profit. Your choice.
Submit payment. Refuse, and I become your shadow. Stealing everything you earn. Forever.
threatWarning: Warning, {empire_name}. I'm prowling near your battles. Any victory you almost win becomes mine.
The Jackal warns you. Fight anyone and I'll steal the outcome. Cease aggression or share your victories.
Final warning. I'm watching your conflicts. Any weakness you exploit, I exploit. From you.
retreat: Prowling away, {empire_name}. But I'll be nearby. Waiting. Watching. Looking for steal opportunities.
Withdrawing to shadows. The Jackal never truly leaves. Just waits for better stealing conditions.
Falling back. Not defeated. Repositioning. The cunning one always finds better opportunities.
eliminated: The Jackal falls. But I stole so many victories. Lived off others' efforts. Not a bad life.
Prowl ends. But I never fought fair. Never worked hard. Always stole. That's legacy enough.
Destroyed. But calculate what I stole versus what I earned. Massive profit. The cunning way.
endgame: Turn {turn}. Maximum stealing. Every battle in the galaxy: I'm nearby. Every victory: potential theft.
Endgame: the ultimate prowl. So many battles. So many victories to steal. The Jackal feasts.
Final phase. Everyone fighting. Everyone weak. Everything steal-able. Paradise for the cunning.
broadcastShout: Empires: Jackal Prowl watches your battles. Fight hard. Weaken each other. I'll take the prize.
Broadcast: I steal victories. Any battle you almost win, I might finish. For myself. You're warned.
To all: why fight when you can steal? The cunning inherit the galaxy. The Jackal is very cunning.
casualMessage: Prowling near battles today, {empire_name}. Lots of stealing opportunities. Good hunting.
Watching conflicts. Looking for exhausted victors. Easy targets. The Jackal's favorite prey.
Quiet day. Nobody fighting. Nothing to steal. Very boring. Fight someone, {empire_name}. I'll help finish.
